Changelog
=========

0.0.4
-----

* New functions: exists, file_to_str, get_extension, remove_extension, 
  change_to_file_dir.

0.0.3
-----

* Removed dependency to email package.
* Renamed email module to emails.

0.0.2
-----

* Added dependency to email package.


0.0.1
-----

* First release.
